name: Incubus Origins (demo)
description:
Didn't you always want to portray a gay janitor in your RPG? Of course you did, don't be shy about it! And now you can! At least until you get him lost in some demon dimension, but who would ever do such a thing, am I right?

And that Janitor is having a dream. Some might even say he gets possessed by a demon. Who might not even be a demon, but one of those things that gave demons a bad rep. Of course your new blue best mate would disagree. And didn't he bestow the greatest of gifts on you?

You will be a wanted man.  Not only do they want you, they'll come to get you. All of them. Everywhere. It's like every porn movie you ever saw came true at once.

It might of course be a bad idea to give into that. World-ending, really. And you thought playing a janitor might be boring, huh? Except of course if you always wanted to play one. You knew it would be life-changing.

Also featuring

- Collectibles!

- Meaningful choices!

- Introducing the WIN-WIN-WIN-Battlesystem

- References that you might be too old for

- References that you might be too young for

- an actual story burried under tons of references, but you'll manage

- the opportunity to tell the developers exactly what you think about the demo so they know exactly what to cut out and put in the season pass
